1589945996_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVu.body: Zeronet is the least secure of all the darknets because of JavaScript exploits that can deanonymize you. Freenet is much better for anonymity and Tribler and Freenet can handle large file sharing unlike zeronet.
